Rejuvenate Mind.name: Rejuvenate Mind
Rejuvenate Mind.flavor: Light emanates from you as you reach into the collective unconscious and touch a font of mental power.
Rejuvenate Mind.effect: You regain either all your power points or the use of all your daily powers, except this one. You also gain a number of temporary hit points equal to your highest ability score. Once you use this power, you cannot recover it except by taking an extended rest.
